synopsis.text: City streamer and gaming aficionado, Ji Qing, embarks on a journey back in time to the Spring and Autumn Period, armed with the powerful cheat tool, 'Shaohao Bone'. However, history takes an unexpected turn as Jing Ke's assassination attempt on Qin succeeds, leading to a relentless power struggle among the seven kingdoms that spans a millennium. Amidst this chaos, the courageous and virtuous Ren Yong emerges as a significant figure. Witness Ji Qing, now an immortal, navigate this tumultuous world as he leaves Yong City, enters the Palace of Learning, and uses his cunning and skills to shape his destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
